trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as text in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 代表在資料繫結控制項中顯示為文字的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display the value of a field as text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>類別可供資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) 以文字顯示欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件顯示的方式會根據使用它的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件做為資料行，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項顯示為一個資料列。

trans-unit.source: To specify the field to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property to the field's name.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的欄位中顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件、 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>屬性欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The field's value can be HTML-encoded before it is displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 欄位的值可以是 HTML 編碼顯示藉由設定之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can apply a custom formatting string to the field's value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定欄位的值套用自訂格式字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property is `true`, the encoded string value of the field is used in the custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>屬性是`true`，自訂格式字串中使用編碼的字串欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，格式化字串會套用至欄位值，只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If a field's value is null, you can display a custom caption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位的值是 null，您可以藉由設定顯示自訂標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件也會自動將轉換空字串 ("") 藉由設定欄位值為 null 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can hide a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>藉由設定資料繫結控制項中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在編輯模式中修改欄位的值，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control), you can hide a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在資料繫結會控制該插入記錄的支援 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項)，您可以隱藏<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done when you want to hide an automatically generated key field in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是當您想要隱藏在插入模式下自動產生索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的頁首和頁尾區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要在頁首或頁尾區段中顯示標題，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是顯示在標頭區段的文字，您可以藉由設定顯示影像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區段可能會隱藏在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: 某些資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項) 即可顯示或隱藏只控制項的整個標頭區段。

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這些資料繫結控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>個別的繫結欄位的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏的整個標頭區段的資料繫結控制項 （如果有的話），請使用控制項的`ShowHeader`屬性。

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>藉由設定欄位的不同部分的樣式屬性的物件 （例如字型色彩、 背景色彩等等）。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Style property
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the child Web server controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 子系 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾區段的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the header section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 標頭區段的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料項目的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to display the values of a field in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件中的欄位值顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位加入至動態建立的資料繫結控制項時，通常會使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要以動態方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件資料繫結控制項，請建立新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入資料繫結控制項的欄位集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項，加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您以動態方式可以將欄位加入資料繫結控制項，強烈建議的欄位以靜態方式宣告，然後顯示或隱藏，視需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 以靜態方式宣告所有欄位可都減少的父資料繫結控制項的檢視狀態的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the formatting string specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" /> property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示當包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" /> 物件的資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，是否將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 屬性指定的格式字串套用至欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to apply the formatting string to field values in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在編輯模式下將格式字串套用至欄位值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) 可讓使用者讀取、 編輯或將記錄插入的不同的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 依預設，格式化字串會指定由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性套用至欄位值只有在資料繫結控制項處於唯讀模式時。

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時顯示的值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件不會自動移除設定格式化的資料來源中更新的欄位時。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想格式儲存的值的一部分，您必須移除的格式以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to apply the formatting string to field values while a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性，將套用的格式字串至欄位值時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The formatting is then programmatically removed before the value is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 然後以程式設計方式移除格式設定，才能更新資料來源中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示在資料來源中更新資料欄位後，是否將空字串值 ("") 自動轉換為 null 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, the <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將空字串值自動轉換為 null 值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: 有時候使用者可能會為欄位值，更新或插入資料錄時輸入空字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性來指定是否為空字串值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中更新資料欄位時。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object displays null values as empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件顯示 null 值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示不同的值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to specify that an empty string ("") field value should automatically be converted to null.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性來指定空字串 ("") 欄位值應該會自動轉換成 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> to copy the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" />，可將目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 的屬性複製過去。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件的屬性複製到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.CopyProperties%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.CopyProperties%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來複製目前的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>方法所建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />.
trans-unit.target: 空的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.CreateField%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.CreateField%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來建立空白<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>要複製目前的內容物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件之資料欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 的資料欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至資料欄位的名稱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The values of the specified field are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object as text.
trans-unit.target: 指定之欄位的值都會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件做為文字。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally format the displayed text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地藉由設定格式化顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a field's value is null, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位的值是 null，空字串 ("") 會顯示預設值。

trans-unit.source: To specify an alternate caption, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定替代的標題，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property to specify which field to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>屬性來指定哪些欄位来顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>欄位資料行中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，指定欄位值的顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 指定欄位值顯示格式的格式化字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示未將特殊格式套用至該欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性來指定自訂的顯示格式的值會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性未設定，該欄位的值會顯示不含任何特殊的格式。

trans-unit.source: In versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `false` in order to format fields that are not string data types.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的版本 ASP.NET 3.5，您必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>屬性`false`才能設定格式的欄位沒有字串資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the field value is converted to a string by the default conversion method before the format string that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property is applied.
trans-unit.target: 否則，將欄位值已轉換字串之前儲存在格式字串的預設轉換方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性會套用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，格式字串套用至該欄位值，其中包含資料繫結控制項時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to field values while in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將格式字串套用至欄位值，在編輯模式中，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 格式字串可以是任何常值字串，而且通常包含該欄位值的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the formatting string `Item Value: {0}`, the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在格式化字串`Item Value: {0}`，當字串出現在欄位的值替換為 {0} 預留位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The rest of the formatting string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字串的其餘部分會顯示為常值文字。

trans-unit.source: If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, only the formatting string itself is included in the final display text (the field's value from the data source is not included).
trans-unit.target: 如果格式化的字串不包含預留位置，只格式化字串本身包含在最後顯示的文字 （從資料來源欄位的值就不會包含）。

trans-unit.source: If the placeholder is a 0 (zero) enclosed in curly braces as shown in the preceding example, the field value is converted to a string by the default method.
trans-unit.target: 如果預留位置括在大括號，如上述範例所示為 0 （零），則欄位值的預設方法被轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: You can append to the zero a string that specifies how the field value should be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定應如何格式化的欄位值的字串附加為零。

trans-unit.source: For example, the placeholder `{0:C}` for a numeric field specifies that value of the field should be converted to a currency format.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將預留位置`{0:C}`數值欄位會指定，欄位的值應轉換成貨幣格式。

trans-unit.source: Formatting is applied by using the <xref:System.String.Format%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 藉由套用格式<xref:System.String.Format%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The number that follows the left curly brace is part of the syntax used by that method and indicates which one of a series of values the placeholder should use.
trans-unit.target: 後面的左大括號的數字是該方法所使用之語法的一部分，並指出預留位置應該使用哪一個的一系列的值。

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, the number that follows the left curly brace can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 因為每個資料格中只能有一個欄位的值，後面的左大括號的數字只可以設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the standard format characters for numeric fields.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出標準格式字元的數值欄位。

trans-unit.source: These format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: 這些格式的字元不區分大小寫，除了`X`，其中顯示在指定的情況下的十六進位字元。

trans-unit.source: You can append a number to most format characters in order to specify how many significant digits or decimal places you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定您想要顯示多少的有效位數或小數位數，您可以將數字附加至大部分的格式字元。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, formatting depends on the server's culture setting.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，格式取決於伺服器的文化特性設定。

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: 範例包括文化特性設定的`en-US`。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字元

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: `C` or `c`
trans-unit.target: `C` 或 `c`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in currency format.
trans-unit.target: 以貨幣格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定小數位的數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:C}`
Format: `{0:C3}`
`D` or `d`
trans-unit.target: `D` 或 `d`

trans-unit.source: Displays integer values in decimal format.
trans-unit.target: 顯示十進位格式的整數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of digits.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定的位數。

trans-unit.source: (Although the type is referred to as "decimal", the numbers are formatted as integers.)
trans-unit.target: （雖然型別稱為 「 小 」，數字會格式化為整數。）

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:D}`
Format: `{0:D6}`
`E` or `e`
trans-unit.target: `E` 或 `e`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 以科學記號 （指數） 格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定小數位的數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:E}`
Format: `{0:E2}`
`F` or `f`
trans-unit.target: `F` 或 `f`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 固定格式來顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定小數位的數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:F}`
Format: `{0:F3}`
`G` or `g`
trans-unit.target: `G` 或 `g`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in general format (the most compact of either fixed-point or scientific notation).
trans-unit.target: 數值會一般格式顯示 （最精簡的固定點和科學標記法）。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of significant digits.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定有效位數的數目。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:G}`
Format: `{0:G2}`
`N` or `n`
trans-unit.target: `N` 或 `n`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in number format (including group separators and optional negative sign).
trans-unit.target: （包括群組分隔符號和選擇性負號） 的數字格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定小數位的數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:N}`
Format: `{0:N4}`
`P` or `p`
trans-unit.target: `P` 或 `p`

trans-unit.source: Displays numeric values in percent format.
trans-unit.target: 以百分比格式顯示數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定小數位的數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:P}`
Format: `{0:P1}`
`R` or `r`
trans-unit.target: `R` 或 `r`

trans-unit.source: Displays <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, or `BigInteger` values in round-trip format.
trans-unit.target: 顯示<xref:System.Single>， <xref:System.Double>，或`BigInteger`反覆存取格式中的值。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:R}`
`X` or `x`
trans-unit.target: `X` 或 `x`

trans-unit.source: Displays integer values in hexadecimal format.
trans-unit.target: 以十六進位格式顯示整數值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of digits.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定的位數。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:X}`
Format: `{0:x4}`
For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，以及顯示其他文化特性值的格式設定的範例，請參閱[標準數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立自訂數值格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂數值格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists format characters for <xref:System.DateTime> fields.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的格式字元<xref:System.DateTime>欄位。

trans-unit.source: Most of these formatting specifications result in a different output depending on culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的這些格式規格會導致不同的輸出，根據文化特性設定而定。

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a <xref:System.DateTime> value of 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM with a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: 範例為用於<xref:System.DateTime>值為 2009 年 6 月 15 日下午 1:45:30 的文化特性設定`en-US`。

trans-unit.source: Format character
trans-unit.target: 格式字元

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Short date pattern.
trans-unit.target: 簡短日期模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:d}`
Long date pattern.
trans-unit.target: 完整日期模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:D}`
Full date/time pattern (short time).
trans-unit.target: 完整日期/時間模式 (簡短時間)。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:f}`
Full date/time pattern (long time).
trans-unit.target: 完整日期/時間模式 (完整時間)。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:F}`
General date/time pattern (short time).
trans-unit.target: 一般日期/時間模式 (簡短時間)。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:g}`
General date/time pattern (long time).
trans-unit.target: 一般日期/時間模式 (完整時間)。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:G}`
`M` or `m`
trans-unit.target: `M` 或 `m`

trans-unit.source: Month/day pattern.
trans-unit.target: 月/日模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:M}`
`O` or `o`
trans-unit.target: `O` 或 `o`

trans-unit.source: Round-trip date/time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 來回日期/時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:o}`
`R` or `r`
trans-unit.target: `R` 或 `r`

trans-unit.source: RFC1123 pattern (for information, see <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: RFC1123 模式 (資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:R}`
Sortable date/time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 可排序日期/時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:s}`
Short time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 簡短時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:t}`
Long time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 完整時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:T}`
Universal sortable date/time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 國際可排序日期/時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:u}`
Universal full date/time pattern.
trans-unit.target: 國際完整日期/時間模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:U}`
`Y` or `y`
trans-unit.target: `Y` 或 `y`

trans-unit.source: Year month pattern.
trans-unit.target: 年月模式。

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:Y}`
For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，以及顯示其他文化特性值的格式設定的範例，請參閱[標準日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom date and time format strings.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以建立自訂日期和時間格式字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property to specify a custom display format for the values of a field.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性，以指定的欄位值的自訂顯示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows one row of the output that is produced by this example.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示一個資料列由本範例所產生的輸出。

trans-unit.source: ProductID
trans-unit.target: ProductID

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: 名稱

trans-unit.source: ProductNumber
trans-unit.target: ProductNumber

trans-unit.source: ListPrice
trans-unit.target: ListPrice

trans-unit.source: Weight
trans-unit.target: 加權

trans-unit.source: ModifiedDate
trans-unit.target: ModifiedDate

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，用於儲存指定儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />，包含要擷取的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示包含唯讀欄位的值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object with the values from the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 物件的值填入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A> method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A>方法會提供便利的方式來擷取欄位的值從指定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，將欄位值傳回透過傳<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件傳入的`dictionary`參數。

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫方法之後，逐一查看<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=nameWithType>物件來存取的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件包含唯讀欄位，則必須傳入`true`如`includeReadOnly`參數來包含這些值。

trans-unit.source: The field value to format.
trans-unit.target: 要格式化的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to encode the value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示對值進行編碼，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 格式化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件中儲存格的指定欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The field value converted to the format specified by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" />.
trans-unit.target: 欄位值，已轉換為 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" /> 指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.FormatDataValue%2A> method is a helper method used to transform a field value to the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.FormatDataValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來轉換指定的格式欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a field value is null, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果欄位值是 null，值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>會傳回屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom formatting routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂格式化常式。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for a field's value when rendering the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 在設計工具中呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件時，擷取欄位值所使用的值。

trans-unit.source: The value to display in the designer as the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 要在設計工具中做為欄位值顯示的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷何值轉譯時，顯示欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>設計工具中的物件。

trans-unit.source: If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法擷取實際資料從資料來源，在設計階段，改為顯示這個方法所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to return a different value to display for the field in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以傳回不同的值，以顯示在設計工具中的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The container for the field value.
trans-unit.target: 欄位值的容器。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the field bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件之欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the field bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 之欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetValue%2A> method is a helper method used to determine the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetValue%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來決定欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is being displayed in a designer and the field value cannot be determined at design time, the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> method is returned instead of the actual field value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>從設計工具中顯示物件，而且無法在設計階段決定的欄位值，傳回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A>方法會傳回而不是實際的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The container specified by the <paramref name="controlContainer" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlContainer" /> 參數指定的容器為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The container specified by the <paramref name="controlContainer" /> parameter does not have a data item.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="controlContainer" /> 參數指定的容器未包含資料項目。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The data field was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到資料欄位。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to provide a custom routine to determine a field's value.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供自訂的常式，以決定欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在資料控制項標頭中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在資料控制項之標頭中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HeaderText%2A> property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HeaderText%2A>屬性來識別資料控制項中的欄位易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HeaderText%2A> property is to provide meaningful column names to data-bound fields in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最常見的應用程式的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HeaderText%2A>屬性是要提供有意義的資料行名稱中的資料繫結欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件中顯示欄位值之前，是否對其進行 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件中顯示欄位值之前，需要對其進行 HTML 編碼，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to specify whether field values are HTML-encoded to their respective string representations before they are displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>屬性來指定欄位值是否為 HTML 編碼成其個別的字串表示法才能顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is `true`, a string value of "\<script>" would be rendered as "<script>".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果這個屬性是`true`，字串值"\<指令碼 > 」 會轉譯為 「<指令碼>"。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the string would be rendered unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，會呈現字串不變。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding field values helps to prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼的欄位值可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意的內容不會再顯示。

trans-unit.source: This property should be enabled whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 可能的話，應該啟用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to prevent field values from being HTML-encoded before being displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>屬性，避免欄位值進行 HTML 編碼才會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether text that is created by applying the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" /> property to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> value should be HTML encoded when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示透過將 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString" /> 屬性套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 值來建立的文字在顯示時，是否應該經過 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text should be HTML-encoded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字應該經過 HTML 編碼則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: HTML 編碼的值，可協助防止跨網站指令碼的攻擊和惡意內容顯示。

trans-unit.source:
HTML encoding is also useful when you want to display HTML code in the browser, such as displaying the string "\
" instead of inserting a line break (`
` element) in the page.
trans-unit.target:
HTML 編碼時也很有用您想要顯示在瀏覽器，例如顯示字串的 HTML 程式碼 」\"而不會插入分行符號 (`
`項目) 中的頁面。

trans-unit.source: This property is new in ASP.NET 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是在 ASP.NET 3.5 中新功能。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` restores the default behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property in versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`false`還原的預設行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>3.5 之前版本的 ASP.NET 中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援排序，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The data control that owns the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />.
trans-unit.target: 擁有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 的資料控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.Initialize%2A> method is called by the data control with which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is associated to perform basic object initialization for instances of the field, before the field is ever added to a rows collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.Initialize%2A>方法由資料控制項與其呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件與其相關聯執行基本物件初始化的欄位之前的欄位加到資料列集合, 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data.
trans-unit.target: 資料控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A>方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法，這類其他方法之前`CreateRow`呼叫以建立特定的資料列與資料。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to perform basic initialization for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件來執行基本的初始設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method if your <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived type requires any object initialization before it populates <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects with data or controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法，如果您<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件與資料或控制項中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlCellType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row.
trans-unit.target: 資料列之以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 物件為指定的資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A> method is implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived types to add text and controls to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object of a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A>方法由實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-衍生型別加入文字和控制項加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>利用資料表來顯示使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的物件。

trans-unit.source: These data controls create the complete table structure row-by-row when the control's `CreateChildControls` method is called.
trans-unit.target: 這些資料控制項建立完整的資料表結構的資料列逐列當控制項的`CreateChildControls`方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A> method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeCell%2A>方法透過呼叫`InitializeRow`方法的資料控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件初始化的資料格的資料或控制項的資料表結構。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method when you are writing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-derived class.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法，當您撰寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>-衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" /> 物件為指定的資料列狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeDataCell%2A> method is a helper method used to initialize a cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.InitializeDataCell%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來初始化中的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom initialization routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂的初始化常式。

trans-unit.source: Represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 表示要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously stored view-state information for this field.
trans-unit.target: 還原這個欄位之前儲存的檢視狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄位值為 null 時所顯示的欄位標題。

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: 當欄位值為 null 時所顯示的欄位標題。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a field's value is stored as null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 有時欄位的值會在資料來源中儲存為 null。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定自訂顯示藉由設定具有 null 值的欄位標題<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，null 的欄位值顯示為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When a record is being updated or inserted in a data-bound control, if the user enters the value specified by this property (other than an empty string) for a field in a data-bound control, that value is automatically converted to null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 時記錄是正在更新或插入資料繫結控制項中，如果使用者輸入值所指定欄位在資料繫結控制項中，這個屬性 （而不是空字串），值會自動轉換為 null 的資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: To convert an empty string field value to a null value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將空白的字串欄位值轉換成 null 值，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property to specify a custom caption to display for null field values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>屬性來指定要針對 null 的欄位值顯示的自訂標題。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位值繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A> method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來繫結中的對應資料格的資料來源中的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件。

trans-unit.source: The control to which the field value is bound is not a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 欄位值繫結至的控制項不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell" />。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this method to perform a custom binding routine.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫此方法以執行自訂繫結常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the field can be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否可以在編輯模式下修改欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to prevent the value of the field from being modified in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要防止在編輯模式下修改欄位值，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to prevent the values displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object from being modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>屬性可防止系統在顯示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>遭到修改的物件。

trans-unit.source: When a data-bound control is in edit mode, fields that are read-only are displayed as plain text, without any editing controls.
trans-unit.target: 當資料繫結控制項處於編輯模式時，則是唯讀的欄位會顯示為純文字，不含任何編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property applies only to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>屬性僅適用於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent fields from showing up in insert mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止欄位出現在插入模式下，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to prevent the values of the key field displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object from being modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>屬性可防止系統在顯示的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件處於編輯模式下修改。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether HTML encoding is supported by a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件是否支援 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" /> to indicate that HTML encoding is supported by a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />.
trans-unit.target: 永遠傳回 <see langword="true" />，以指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 支援 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.SupportsHtmlEncode%2A> property is a helper property used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class and derived classes to determine whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.SupportsHtmlEncode%2A>屬性是所使用的協助程式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>類別和衍生的類別，以判斷該類別是否支援 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class, you can override this property to indicate whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別，您可以覆寫這個屬性，指出類別是否支援 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Represents the "this" expression.
trans-unit.target: 代表 "this" 運算式。

trans-unit.source: This field is used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object should bind against the data source itself, rather than a field of the data source.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位用來指出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>物件應該繫結的目標資料來源本身，而不是資料來源的欄位。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the object's `ToString` value will be displayed in the field.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，物件的`ToString`欄位中，將會顯示值。

trans-unit.source: This field is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 主要由控制項開發人員使用此欄位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定控制項是否驗證用戶端輸入。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.
trans-unit.target: 決定控制項是否驗證用戶端輸入的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> 物件中所包含的控制項是否支援回呼 (Callback)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A> method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ValidateSupportsCallback%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>支援回呼的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經作為空方法 （不包含任何程式碼的方法），表示支援回呼實作。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" /> class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField" />類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。
